title: Create or Amend Partner Income Request
description: Create or Amend Partner Income Request

partnershipUtr.description:
A Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR) for the partnership.

Must conform to the regular expression `^[0-9]{10}$`

For example: 4564564564

partnershipName.description:
The name of the partnership.

Must conform to the regular expression: `^.{1,105}$`

For example: ABC Partnership

startDate.description:
The date the individual joined the partnership during the tax year.

Must conform to the format `YYYY-MM-DD`

For example: 2026-06-24

endDate.description:
The date the individual left the partnership during the tax year.

Must conform to the format `YYYY-MM-DD`

For example: 2026-07-24

cashBasis.description:
Indicates whether the partnership used cash basis (money actually received and paid out) to calculate its trading and professional income and expenses.

For example: true

partnershipTrades.description: An array containing details of the partnership's trades.

tradeDescription.description:
A description of the partnership trade or profession. This description must be unique for each trade reported. Validation is case-insensitive. 

Must conform to the regular expression: `^.{1,30}$`

For example: Consultancy Services

tradingOrProfessionalProfits.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's trading or professional profits.

shareOfProfitOrLoss.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's trading or professional profit or loss. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

basisAdjustment.description:
If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period. If the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

accountingAdjustment.description:
The adjustment for change of accounting practice. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

averagingAdjustment.description:
The averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works) â€“ if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

foreignTaxClaimedDeduction.description:
The foreign tax claimed as deduction only if Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

adjustedProfit.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's profit of the year, after all statutory adjustments (basis, accounting, averaging and foreign tax) have been applied. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

transitionProfitArisingThisYear.description:
The amount of transition profit treated as arising in the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesBroughtForwardTransitionProfit.description:
The amount of losses brought forward from earlier years set off against the tax year's amount of transition profit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesBroughtForwardAdjustedProfit.description:
The amount of losses brought forward from earlier years set off against the tax year's adjusted profit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

profitAfterBroughtForwardLosses.description:
The taxable profit remaining after deducting losses brought forward from earlier years, excluding the amount of transition profit treated as arising in the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherBusinessIncome.description:
Any other business income received as a partner that was not included in the partnership accounts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxableProfit.description:
The individual's share of total taxable profit from the partnership's business for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

tradingOrProfessionalLosses.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's trading or professional losses.

adjustedLoss.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's loss of the year, after all statutory adjustments (basis, accounting, averaging and foreign tax) have been applied. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

currentYearLossAppliedToGeneralIncome.description:
The amount of the current tax year's loss set off against the individual's other income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesCarriedBack.description:
The amount of loss to be carried back to previous years and set off against income or capital gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

carryForwardLosses.description:
The total amount of losses to carry forward after all other set-offs, including unused losses brought forward. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

nationalInsuranceContributions.description: Object containing details of Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance contributions (NICs).

voluntaryClass2Nics.description:
Indicate whether the individual wants to pay Class 2 NICs voluntarily to protect entitlement to certain benefits if profits are below the Small Profits Threshold.

For example: true

class4Exemption.description:
Indicate whether the individual is exempt from paying Class 4 NICs.

For example: true

adjustmentToProfitsForClass4.description:
The adjustment to the individual's profits specifically used to calculate Class 4 NICs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

untaxedSavingsIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's untaxed savings income and related adjustments.

shareOfUkUntaxedSavingsIncome.description:
The individual's share of UK untaxed savings income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

untaxedSavingsIncomeAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to UK untaxed savings income, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

adjustedUkSavingsIncome.description:
The total adjusted UK savings income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfForeignUntaxedSavingsIncome.description:
The individual's share of foreign untaxed savings income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

foreignUntaxedSavingsIncomeAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to foreign untaxed savings income, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The total amount of foreign tax deducted where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

adjustedForeignSavingsIncome.description:
The total adjusted foreign savings income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalUntaxedSavingsIncome.description:
The total amount of untaxed savings income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

ukPropertyIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's UK property income and related adjustments.

shareOfProfitOrLoss.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's UK property profit or loss. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

profitOrLossAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to UK property profit or loss, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesBroughtForward.description:
The amount of UK property losses brought forward from earlier years set off against the tax year's profits. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

currentYearLossAppliedToGeneralIncome.description:
The amount of the current tax year's UK property loss set off against the individual's other income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

carryForwardLosses.description:
The total amount of UK property losses to carry forward after all other set-offs, including unused losses brought forward. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxableProfit.description:
The individual's share of total taxable profit from the UK property business for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

residentialPropertyFinanceCosts.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's residential property finance costs for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

residentialPropertyFinanceCostsBroughtFo.description:
The unused residential property finance costs brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedUkIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's other untaxed UK income and related adjustments.

shareOfOtherUntaxedUkIncome.description:
The individual's share of other untaxed UK income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedUkIncomeAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to other untaxed UK income, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesBroughtForward.description:
The amount of losses brought forward from earlier years set off against the tax year's other untaxed UK income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxableProfit.description:
The individual's share of total taxable profit from other untaxed UK income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfLoss.description:
The individual's share of loss from other untaxed UK income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedUkIncomeLossAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to the individual's share of loss from other untaxed UK income for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

carryForwardLosses.description:
The total amount of other untaxed UK income losses to carry forward after all other set-offs, including unused losses brought forward. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

offshoreFundsIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's income from offshore funds and related adjustments.

shareOfOffshoreFundsIncome.description:
The individual's share of income from offshore funds. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

offshoreFundsIncomeAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to income from offshore funds, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The total amount of foreign tax deducted where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxableIncome.description:
The individual's share of total taxable income from  offshore funds for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedForeignIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's other untaxed foreign income and related adjustments.

shareOfOtherUntaxedForeignIncome.description:
The individual's share of other untaxed foreign income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedForeignIncomeAdjustment.description:
The adjustment to other untaxed foreign income, including any adjustment for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

lossesBroughtForward.description:
The amount of losses brought forward from earlier years set off against the tax year's other untaxed foreign income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The total amount of foreign tax deducted where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxableProfit.description:
The individual's share of total taxable profit from other untaxed foreign income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfLoss.description:
The individual's share of loss from other untaxed foreign income for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherUntaxedForeignIncomeLossesAdjustmen.description:
The adjustment to the individual's share of loss from other untaxed foreign income for the tax year. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

carryForwardLosses.description:
The total amount of other untaxed foreign income losses to carry forward after all other set-offs, including unused losses brought forward. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

residentialPropertyFinanceCosts.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's residential property finance costs for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

residentialPropertyFinanceCostsBroughtFo.description:
The unused residential property finance costs brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalUntaxedIncomeExcludingSavings.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's total untaxed income, excluding savings income.

shareOfTotalUntaxedIncomeExcludingSaving.description:
The individual's share of the partnership's total untaxed income, excluding savings income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
For example: 5000.99

taxedIncomeAndDividendIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's dividend income and taxed income.

shareOfDividendIncome.description:
The individual's share of dividend income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

dividendIncomeForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The amount of foreign tax deducted from dividend income where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalDividendIncome.description:
The total amount of dividend income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxedIncome.description:
The individual's share of taxed income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

taxedIncomeForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The amount of foreign tax deducted from taxed income where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalTaxedIncome.description:
The total amount of taxed income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfOtherTaxedIncome.description:
The individual's share of other taxed income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

otherTaxedIncomeForeignTaxTakenOff.description:
The amount of foreign tax deducted from other taxed income where Foreign Tax Credit Relief is not being claimed. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

totalTaxedAndUntaxedIncome.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's total taxed and untaxed income.

shareOfTotalTaxedAndUntaxedIncome.description:
The individual's share of the total taxed and untaxed income from the partnership. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

taxPaidAndDeductions.description: Object containing details of the individual's share of the partnership's tax paid and deductions.

shareOfIncomeTaxTakenOffPartnershipIncom.description:
The individual's share of income tax deducted from partnership income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfCisDeductionsByContractors.description:
The individual's share of Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) deductions made by contractors. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTaxTakenOffTradingIncome.description:
The individual's share of any tax deducted from trading income (excluding CIS deductions). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99

shareOfTotalTaxTakenOff.description:
The individual's share of total tax deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

For example: 5000.99
